messages.subject: Shameless plug for my new blog
messages.msgSnippet: I just started a blog about our new unschooling life (right now there aren t new pictures on it, we re looking for the cable to download pictures from our
messages.messageBody:
I just started a blog about our new unschooling life (right now there aren't new pictures on it, we're looking for the cable to download pictures from our camera). I just posted Day 1 of our deschooling bedtime, and welcome thoughts and comments.

The blog is: Catching a Cloud http://willowowisp.blogspot.com

Maria
